data.eml:eml: New taxonomic and conservation status of Ossiculum (Vandeae, Orchidaceae), a highly threatened and narrow-endemic angraecoid orchid from Central Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simo-Droissart, Murielle, Stevart, Tariq, Sonke, Bonaventure, Sandrine Mayogo,, Kamdem, Narcisse, Droissart, Vincent (2018): New taxonomic and conservation status of Ossiculum (Vandeae, Orchidaceae), a highly threatened and narrow-endemic angraecoid orchid from Central Africa. PhytoKeys 98: 85-97, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.98.23511, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.98.23511
